EnsemblGenomes

Source: vignettes/EnsemblGenomes.Rmd
EnsemblGenomes.Rmd

Introduction

EnsemblGenomes scrapes [ensembl.org] and [ensemblgenomes.org] FTP servers to locate genome reference fasta files and genome annotation gff3 files provided for species supported by Ensembl. As of July 2024, this corresponds to more than 300 vertebrate, 300 metazoa, 200 protists, 150 plants, 1,000 fungi and 30,000 bacteria species. Rather than supporting BiocFileCache, EnsemblGenomes simply intends to retrieve and list URL of fasta and gff3 files across Ensembl releases as a plain data frame.

Installation

EnsemblGenomes package can be installed from Bioconductor using the following command:

if (!require("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE))
    install.packages("BiocManager")

BiocManager::install("EnsemblGenomes")

list_ensembl_* functions

Four functions are available:

  • list_ensembl_files()
  • list_ensembl_species()
  • list_ensembl_taxa()
  • list_ensembl_releases()
library(EnsemblGenomes)

list_ensembl_taxa()
#> # A tibble: 6 × 2
#>   taxon      url                                               
#>   <chr>      <chr>                                             
#> 1 vertebrate https://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/                      
#> 2 metazoa    https://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/ensemblgenomes/pub/metazoa/ 
#> 3 protists   https://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/ensemblgenomes/pub/protists/
#> 4 fungi      https://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/ensemblgenomes/pub/fungi/   
#> 5 plants     https://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/ensemblgenomes/pub/plants/  
#> 6 bacteria   https://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/ensemblgenomes/pub/bacteria/

list_ensembl_releases(taxon = 'vertebrate')
#> # A tibble: 32 × 3
#>    release     date             url                                    
#>    <chr>       <chr>            <chr>                                  
#>  1 release-112 2024-06-20 11:33 https://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/release-112
#>  2 release-111 2024-06-11 16:17 https://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/release-111
#>  3 release-110 2024-01-25 09:34 https://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/release-110
#>  4 release-109 2023-03-02 09:36 https://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/release-109
#>  5 release-108 2022-10-10 12:59 https://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/release-108
#>  6 release-107 2022-10-24 14:15 https://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/release-107
#>  7 release-106 2022-08-30 11:58 https://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/release-106
#>  8 release-105 2022-02-11 18:12 https://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/release-105
#>  9 release-104 2021-03-30 13:08 https://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/release-104
#> 10 release-103 2021-02-16 17:52 https://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/release-103
#> # ℹ 22 more rows

list_ensembl_species('vertebrate', release = 'release-100')
#> # A tibble: 286 × 6
#>    species                          url           taxon collection release date 
#>    <chr>                            <glue>        <chr> <lgl>      <chr>   <chr>
#>  1 acanthochromis_polyacanthus      https://ense… vert… NA         releas… 2020…
#>  2 accipiter_nisus                  https://ense… vert… NA         releas… 2020…
#>  3 ailuropoda_melanoleuca           https://ense… vert… NA         releas… 2020…
#>  4 amazona_collaria                 https://ense… vert… NA         releas… 2020…
#>  5 amphilophus_citrinellus          https://ense… vert… NA         releas… 2020…
#>  6 amphiprion_ocellaris             https://ense… vert… NA         releas… 2020…
#>  7 amphiprion_percula               https://ense… vert… NA         releas… 2020…
#>  8 anabas_testudineus               https://ense… vert… NA         releas… 2020…
#>  9 anas_platyrhynchos               https://ense… vert… NA         releas… 2020…
#> 10 anas_platyrhynchos_platyrhynchos https://ense… vert… NA         releas… 2020…
#> # ℹ 276 more rows

list_ensembl_files('amphiprion_percula', release = 'release-100')
#> ℹ Scanning taxons [release-100]...
#> ✔ Taxon found: vertebrate [release-100]
#> # A tibble: 4 × 8
#>   date             release     taxon   collection species type  url   url_status
#>   <chr>            <chr>       <chr>   <lgl>      <chr>   <chr> <chr>      <int>
#> 1 2020-03-04 22:28 release-100 verteb… NA         amphip… refe… http…        200
#> 2 2020-03-04 22:28 release-100 verteb… NA         amphip… refe… http…        200
#> 3 2020-03-04 22:28 release-100 verteb… NA         amphip… refe… http…        200
#> 4 2020-03-16 00:31 release-100 verteb… NA         amphip… anno… http…        200
